div.a: Proper Use and Reuse of Face Masks

br.span: Watch this instructional video shared with you from a YouTube Video regarding the Proper Use and Reuse of Face Masks in a safe way. The video demonstrates putting on, taking off, and storing a mask for reuse. Click Video
